invalidOption() - Method in class view.InvestmentView

InvestmentModel - Class in model
This is the concrete implementation of interface simulates the functionality of stock market and provides users operations to buy stocks, create portfolio and view its compositions.
InvestmentModel() - Constructor for class model.InvestmentModel
This constructor is used to instantiate the Investmant model.
InvestmentModelInterface - Interface in model
This interface simulates the functionality of stock market and provides users operations to buy stocks, create portfolio and view its compositions.
InvestmentView - Class in view
This class is the view that will contain everything that is to be displayed by the application.
InvestmentView(Appendable) - Constructor for class view.InvestmentView
Instantiates a new Investment view.

This class represents a StockMarket controller and performs all the operations.
IStockMarketSimulation - Interface in service
This Interface simulates the Stock market where in it keep a record of the stocks of different companies.

This method yields true if the date paseed is a weekday.
